Text: Before I try to download, what's the file format?  I'm on vacation, and my little netbook can't handle mkv.
The KIT guys are awesome, and I am utterly grateful for this upload - however, 3 GB for a 110 min. runtime, and a trillion of RAR files means that I'll give this version a pass.
